00069 /********************* Layer type information **********************/
00070 typedef struct LayerTypeInfo {
00071     int size;          /* the memory size of one element of this layer's data */
00072     const char *structname;  /* name of the struct used, for file writing */
00073     int structnum;     /* number of structs per element, for file writing */
00074     const char *defaultname; /* default layer name */
00075 
00076     /* a function to copy count elements of this layer's data
00077      * (deep copy if appropriate)
00078      * if NULL, memcpy is used
00079      */
00080     void (*copy)(const void *source, void *dest, int count);
00081 
00082     /* a function to free any dynamically allocated components of this
00083      * layer's data (note the data pointer itself should not be freed)
00084      * size should be the size of one element of this layer's data (e.g.
00085      * LayerTypeInfo.size)
00086      */
00087     void (*free)(void *data, int count, int size);
00088 
00089     /* a function to interpolate between count source elements of this
00090      * layer's data and store the result in dest
00091      * if weights == NULL or sub_weights == NULL, they should default to 1
00092      *
00093      * weights gives the weight for each element in sources
00094      * sub_weights gives the sub-element weights for each element in sources
00095      *    (there should be (sub element count)^2 weights per element)
00096      * count gives the number of elements in sources
00097      */
00098     void (*interp)(void **sources, float *weights, float *sub_weights,
00099                    int count, void *dest);
00100 
00101     /* a function to swap the data in corners of the element */
00102     void (*swap)(void *data, const int *corner_indices);
00103 
00104     /* a function to set a layer's data to default values. if NULL, the
00105      * default is assumed to be all zeros */
00106     void (*set_default)(void *data, int count);
00107 
00108     /* functions necessary for geometry collapse*/
00109     int (*equal)(void *data1, void *data2);
00110     void (*multiply)(void *data, float fac);
00111     void (*initminmax)(void *min, void *max);
00112     void (*add)(void *data1, void *data2);
00113     void (*dominmax)(void *data1, void *min, void *max);
00114     void (*copyvalue)(void *source, void *dest);
00115 
00116     /* a function to read data from a cdf file */
00117     int (*read)(CDataFile *cdf, void *data, int count);
00118 
00119     /* a function to write data to a cdf file */
00120     int (*write)(CDataFile *cdf, void *data, int count);
00121 
00122     /* a function to determine file size */
00123     size_t (*filesize)(CDataFile *cdf, void *data, int count);
00124 } LayerTypeInfo;

00126 static void layerCopy_mdeformvert(const void *source, void *dest,
00127                                   int count)
00128 {
00129     int i, size = sizeof(MDeformVert);
00130 
00131     memcpy(dest, source, count * size);
00132 
00133     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00134         MDeformVert *dvert = (MDeformVert *)((char *)dest + i * size);
00135 
00136         if (dvert->totweight) {
00137             MDeformWeight *dw = MEM_callocN(dvert->totweight * sizeof(*dw),
00138                                             "layerCopy_mdeformvert dw");
00139 
00140             memcpy(dw, dvert->dw, dvert->totweight * sizeof(*dw));
00141             dvert->dw = dw;
00142         }
00143         else
00144             dvert->dw = NULL;
00145     }
00146 }
00147 
00148 static void layerFree_mdeformvert(void *data, int count, int size)
00149 {
00150     int i;
00151 
00152     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00153         MDeformVert *dvert = (MDeformVert *)((char *)data + i * size);
00154 
00155         if (dvert->dw) {
00156             MEM_freeN(dvert->dw);
00157             dvert->dw = NULL;
00158             dvert->totweight = 0;
00159         }
00160     }
00161 }

00202 static void layerInterp_mdeformvert(void **sources, float *weights,
00203                                     float *UNUSED(sub_weights), int count, void *dest)
00204 {
00205     MDeformVert *dvert = dest;
00206     LinkNode *dest_dw = NULL; /* a list of lists of MDeformWeight pointers */
00207     LinkNode *node;
00208     int i, j, totweight;
00209 
00210     if (count <= 0) return;
00211 
00212     /* build a list of unique def_nrs for dest */
00213     totweight = 0;
00214     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00215         MDeformVert *source = sources[i];
00216         float interp_weight = weights ? weights[i] : 1.0f;
00217 
00218         for (j = 0; j < source->totweight; ++j) {
00219             MDeformWeight *dw = &source->dw[j];
00220 
00221             for (node = dest_dw; node; node = node->next) {
00222                 MDeformWeight *tmp_dw = (MDeformWeight *)node->link;
00223 
00224                 if (tmp_dw->def_nr == dw->def_nr) {
00225                     tmp_dw->weight += dw->weight * interp_weight;
00226                     break;
00227                 }
00228             }
00229 
00230             /* if this def_nr is not in the list, add it */
00231             if (!node) {
00232                 MDeformWeight *tmp_dw = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*tmp_dw),
00233                                             "layerInterp_mdeformvert tmp_dw");
00234                 tmp_dw->def_nr = dw->def_nr;
00235                 tmp_dw->weight = dw->weight * interp_weight;
00236                 BLI_linklist_prepend(&dest_dw, tmp_dw);
00237                 totweight++;
00238             }
00239         }
00240     }
00241 
00242     /* now we know how many unique deform weights there are, so realloc */
00243     if (dvert->dw) MEM_freeN(dvert->dw);
00244 
00245     if (totweight) {
00246         dvert->dw = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*dvert->dw) * totweight,
00247                                 "layerInterp_mdeformvert dvert->dw");
00248         dvert->totweight = totweight;
00249 
00250         for (i = 0, node = dest_dw; node; node = node->next, ++i)
00251             dvert->dw[i] = *((MDeformWeight *)node->link);
00252     }
00253     else
00254         memset(dvert, 0, sizeof(*dvert));
00255 
00256     BLI_linklist_free(dest_dw, linklist_free_simple);
00257 }

00260 static void layerInterp_msticky(void **sources, float *weights,
00261                                 float *UNUSED(sub_weights), int count, void *dest)
00262 {
00263     float co[2], w;
00264     MSticky *mst;
00265     int i;
00266 
00267     co[0] = co[1] = 0.0f;
00268     for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00269         w = weights ? weights[i] : 1.0f;
00270         mst = (MSticky*)sources[i];
00271 
00272         madd_v2_v2fl(co, mst->co, w);
00273     }
00274 
00275     mst = (MSticky*)dest;
00276     copy_v2_v2(mst->co, co);
00277 }

00280 static void layerCopy_tface(const void *source, void *dest, int count)
00281 {
00282     const MTFace *source_tf = (const MTFace*)source;
00283     MTFace *dest_tf = (MTFace*)dest;
00284     int i;
00285 
00286     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00287         dest_tf[i] = source_tf[i];
00288 }
00289 
00290 static void layerInterp_tface(void **sources, float *weights,
00291                               float *sub_weights, int count, void *dest)
00292 {
00293     MTFace *tf = dest;
00294     int i, j, k;
00295     float uv[4][2] = {{0.0f}};
00296     float *sub_weight;
00297 
00298     if (count <= 0) return;
00299 
00300     sub_weight = sub_weights;
00301     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00302         float weight = weights ? weights[i] : 1;
00303         MTFace *src = sources[i];
00304 
00305         for (j = 0; j < 4; ++j) {
00306             if (sub_weights) {
00307                 for (k = 0; k < 4; ++k, ++sub_weight) {
00308                     madd_v2_v2fl(uv[j], src->uv[k], (*sub_weight) * weight);
00309                 }
00310             }
00311             else {
00312                 madd_v2_v2fl(uv[j], src->uv[j], weight);
00313             }
00314         }
00315     }
00316 
00317     *tf = *(MTFace *)(*sources);
00318     memcpy(tf->uv, uv, sizeof(tf->uv));
00319 }
00320 
00321 static void layerSwap_tface(void *data, const int *corner_indices)
00322 {
00323     MTFace *tf = data;
00324     float uv[4][2];
00325     static const short pin_flags[4] =
00326         { TF_PIN1, TF_PIN2, TF_PIN3, TF_PIN4 };
00327     static const char sel_flags[4] =
00328         { TF_SEL1, TF_SEL2, TF_SEL3, TF_SEL4 };
00329     short unwrap = tf->unwrap & ~(TF_PIN1 | TF_PIN2 | TF_PIN3 | TF_PIN4);
00330     char flag = tf->flag & ~(TF_SEL1 | TF_SEL2 | TF_SEL3 | TF_SEL4);
00331     int j;
00332 
00333     for (j = 0; j < 4; ++j) {
00334         const int source_index = corner_indices[j];
00335 
00336         copy_v2_v2(uv[j], tf->uv[source_index]);
00337 
00338         // swap pinning flags around
00339         if (tf->unwrap & pin_flags[source_index]) {
00340             unwrap |= pin_flags[j];
00341         }
00342 
00343         // swap selection flags around
00344         if (tf->flag & sel_flags[source_index]) {
00345             flag |= sel_flags[j];
00346         }
00347     }
00348 
00349     memcpy(tf->uv, uv, sizeof(tf->uv));
00350     tf->unwrap = unwrap;
00351     tf->flag = flag;
00352 }
00353 
00354 static void layerDefault_tface(void *data, int count)
00355 {
00356     static MTFace default_tf = {{{0, 0}, {1, 0}, {1, 1}, {0, 1}}, NULL,
00357                                0, 0, TF_DYNAMIC|TF_CONVERTED, 0, 0};
00358     MTFace *tf = (MTFace*)data;
00359     int i;
00360 
00361     for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
00362         tf[i] = default_tf;
00363 }

00393 static void layerInterp_origspace_face(void **sources, float *weights,
00394                               float *sub_weights, int count, void *dest)
00395 {
00396     OrigSpaceFace *osf = dest;
00397     int i, j, k;
00398     float uv[4][2] = {{0.0f}};
00399     float *sub_weight;
00400 
00401     if (count <= 0) return;
00402 
00403     sub_weight = sub_weights;
00404     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00405         float weight = weights ? weights[i] : 1;
00406         OrigSpaceFace *src = sources[i];
00407 
00408         for (j = 0; j < 4; ++j) {
00409             if (sub_weights) {
00410                 for (k = 0; k < 4; ++k, ++sub_weight) {
00411                     madd_v2_v2fl(uv[j], src->uv[k], (*sub_weight) * weight);
00412                 }
00413             }
00414             else {
00415                 madd_v2_v2fl(uv[j], src->uv[j], weight);
00416             }
00417         }
00418     }
00419 
00420 #if 0 /* no need, this ONLY contains UV's */
00421     *osf = *(OrigSpaceFace *)(*sources);
00422 #endif
00423     memcpy(osf->uv, uv, sizeof(osf->uv));
00424 }

00448 static void layerSwap_mdisps(void *data, const int *ci)
00449 {
00450     MDisps *s = data;
00451     float (*d)[3] = NULL;
00452     int corners, cornersize, S;
00453 
00454     if (s->disps) {
00455         int nverts= (ci[1] == 3) ? 4 : 3; /* silly way to know vertex count of face */
00456         corners= multires_mdisp_corners(s);
00457         cornersize= s->totdisp/corners;
00458 
00459         if (corners!=nverts) {
00460             /* happens when face changed vertex count in edit mode
00461              * if it happened, just forgot displacement */
00462 
00463             MEM_freeN(s->disps);
00464             s->totdisp= (s->totdisp/corners)*nverts;
00465             s->disps= MEM_callocN(s->totdisp*sizeof(float)*3, "mdisp swap");
00466             return;
00467         }
00468 
00469         d= MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * s->totdisp, "mdisps swap");
00470 
00471         for (S = 0; S < corners; S++)
00472             memcpy(d + cornersize*S, s->disps + cornersize*ci[S], cornersize*3*sizeof(float));
00473         
00474         MEM_freeN(s->disps);
00475         s->disps= d;
00476     }
00477 }
00478 
00479 static void layerCopy_mdisps(const void *source, void *dest, int count)
00480 {
00481     int i;
00482     const MDisps *s = source;
00483     MDisps *d = dest;
00484 
00485     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00486         if (s[i].disps) {
00487             d[i].disps = MEM_dupallocN(s[i].disps);
00488             d[i].hidden = MEM_dupallocN(s[i].hidden);
00489             d[i].totdisp = s[i].totdisp;
00490             d[i].level = s[i].level;
00491         }
00492         else {
00493             d[i].disps = NULL;
00494             d[i].hidden = NULL;
00495             d[i].totdisp = 0;
00496             d[i].level = 0;
00497         }
00498         
00499     }
00500 }
00501 
00502 static void layerFree_mdisps(void *data, int count, int UNUSED(size))
00503 {
00504     int i;
00505     MDisps *d = data;
00506 
00507     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00508         if (d[i].disps)
00509             MEM_freeN(d[i].disps);
00510         if (d[i].hidden)
00511             MEM_freeN(d[i].hidden);
00512         d[i].disps = NULL;
00513         d[i].hidden = NULL;
00514         d[i].totdisp = 0;
00515         d[i].level = 0;
00516     }
00517 }

00519 static int layerRead_mdisps(CDataFile *cdf, void *data, int count)
00520 {
00521     MDisps *d = data;
00522     int i;
00523 
00524     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00525         if (!d[i].disps)
00526             d[i].disps = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*3*d[i].totdisp, "mdisps read");
00527 
00528         if (!cdf_read_data(cdf, d[i].totdisp*3*sizeof(float), d[i].disps)) {
00529             printf("failed to read multires displacement %d/%d %d\n", i, count, d[i].totdisp);
00530             return 0;
00531         }
00532     }
00533 
00534     return 1;
00535 }
00536 
00537 static int layerWrite_mdisps(CDataFile *cdf, void *data, int count)
00538 {
00539     MDisps *d = data;
00540     int i;
00541 
00542     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00543         if (!cdf_write_data(cdf, d[i].totdisp*3*sizeof(float), d[i].disps)) {
00544             printf("failed to write multires displacement %d/%d %d\n", i, count, d[i].totdisp);
00545             return 0;
00546         }
00547     }
00548 
00549     return 1;
00550 }

00552 static size_t layerFilesize_mdisps(CDataFile *UNUSED(cdf), void *data, int count)
00553 {
00554     MDisps *d = data;
00555     size_t size = 0;
00556     int i;
00557 
00558     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00559         size += d[i].totdisp*3*sizeof(float);
00560 
00561     return size;
00562 }

00565 static void layerCopyValue_mloopcol(void *source, void *dest)
00566 {
00567     MLoopCol *m1 = source, *m2 = dest;
00568     
00569     m2->r = m1->r;
00570     m2->g = m1->g;
00571     m2->b = m1->b;
00572     m2->a = m1->a;
00573 }
00574 
00575 static int layerEqual_mloopcol(void *data1, void *data2)
00576 {
00577     MLoopCol *m1 = data1, *m2 = data2;
00578     float r, g, b, a;
00579 
00580     r = m1->r - m2->r;
00581     g = m1->g - m2->g;
00582     b = m1->b - m2->b;
00583     a = m1->a - m2->a;
00584 
00585     return r*r + g*g + b*b + a*a < 0.001;
00586 }
00587 
00588 static void layerMultiply_mloopcol(void *data, float fac)
00589 {
00590     MLoopCol *m = data;
00591 
00592     m->r = (float)m->r * fac;
00593     m->g = (float)m->g * fac;
00594     m->b = (float)m->b * fac;
00595     m->a = (float)m->a * fac;
00596 }
00597 
00598 static void layerAdd_mloopcol(void *data1, void *data2)
00599 {
00600     MLoopCol *m = data1, *m2 = data2;
00601 
00602     m->r += m2->r;
00603     m->g += m2->g;
00604     m->b += m2->b;
00605     m->a += m2->a;
00606 }
00607 
00608 static void layerDoMinMax_mloopcol(void *data, void *vmin, void *vmax)
00609 {
00610     MLoopCol *m = data;
00611     MLoopCol *min = vmin, *max = vmax;
00612 
00613     if (m->r < min->r) min->r = m->r;
00614     if (m->g < min->g) min->g = m->g;
00615     if (m->b < min->b) min->b = m->b;
00616     if (m->a < min->a) min->a = m->a;
00617     
00618     if (m->r > max->r) max->r = m->r;
00619     if (m->g > max->g) max->g = m->g;
00620     if (m->b > max->b) max->b = m->b;
00621     if (m->a > max->a) max->a = m->a;
00622 }
00623 
00624 static void layerInitMinMax_mloopcol(void *vmin, void *vmax)
00625 {
00626     MLoopCol *min = vmin, *max = vmax;
00627 
00628     min->r = 255;
00629     min->g = 255;
00630     min->b = 255;
00631     min->a = 255;
00632 
00633     max->r = 0;
00634     max->g = 0;
00635     max->b = 0;
00636     max->a = 0;
00637 }
00638 
00639 static void layerDefault_mloopcol(void *data, int count)
00640 {
00641     MLoopCol default_mloopcol = {255,255,255,255};
00642     MLoopCol *mlcol = (MLoopCol*)data;
00643     int i;
00644     for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
00645         mlcol[i] = default_mloopcol;
00646 
00647 }
00648 
00649 static void layerInterp_mloopcol(void **sources, float *weights,
00650                 float *sub_weights, int count, void *dest)
00651 {
00652     MLoopCol *mc = dest;
00653     int i;
00654     float *sub_weight;
00655     struct {
00656         float a;
00657         float r;
00658         float g;
00659         float b;
00660     } col;
00661     col.a = col.r = col.g = col.b = 0;
00662 
00663     sub_weight = sub_weights;
00664     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00665         float weight = weights ? weights[i] : 1;
00666         MLoopCol *src = sources[i];
00667         if (sub_weights) {
00668             col.r += src->r * (*sub_weight) * weight;
00669             col.g += src->g * (*sub_weight) * weight;
00670             col.b += src->b * (*sub_weight) * weight;
00671             col.a += src->a * (*sub_weight) * weight;
00672             sub_weight++;
00673         }
00674         else {
00675             col.r += src->r * weight;
00676             col.g += src->g * weight;
00677             col.b += src->b * weight;
00678             col.a += src->a * weight;
00679         }
00680     }
00681     
00682     /* Subdivide smooth or fractal can cause problems without clamping
00683      * although weights should also not cause this situation */
00684     CLAMP(col.a, 0.0f, 255.0f);
00685     CLAMP(col.r, 0.0f, 255.0f);
00686     CLAMP(col.g, 0.0f, 255.0f);
00687     CLAMP(col.b, 0.0f, 255.0f);
00688     
00689     mc->r = (int)col.r;
00690     mc->g = (int)col.g;
00691     mc->b = (int)col.b;
00692     mc->a = (int)col.a;
00693 }
00694 
00695 static void layerCopyValue_mloopuv(void *source, void *dest)
00696 {
00697     MLoopUV *luv1 = source, *luv2 = dest;
00698 
00699     copy_v2_v2(luv2->uv, luv1->uv);
00700 }
00701 
00702 static int layerEqual_mloopuv(void *data1, void *data2)
00703 {
00704     MLoopUV *luv1 = data1, *luv2 = data2;
00705 
00706     return len_squared_v2v2(luv1->uv, luv2->uv) < 0.00001f;
00707 }
00708 
00709 static void layerMultiply_mloopuv(void *data, float fac)
00710 {
00711     MLoopUV *luv = data;
00712 
00713     mul_v2_fl(luv->uv, fac);
00714 }
00715 
00716 static void layerInitMinMax_mloopuv(void *vmin, void *vmax)
00717 {
00718     MLoopUV *min = vmin, *max = vmax;
00719 
00720     INIT_MINMAX2(min->uv, max->uv);
00721 }
00722 
00723 static void layerDoMinMax_mloopuv(void *data, void *vmin, void *vmax)
00724 {
00725     MLoopUV *min = vmin, *max = vmax, *luv = data;
00726 
00727     DO_MINMAX2(luv->uv, min->uv, max->uv);
00728 }
00729 
00730 static void layerAdd_mloopuv(void *data1, void *data2)
00731 {
00732     MLoopUV *l1 = data1, *l2 = data2;
00733 
00734     add_v2_v2(l1->uv, l2->uv);
00735 }
00736 
00737 static void layerInterp_mloopuv(void **sources, float *weights,
00738                                 float *sub_weights, int count, void *dest)
00739 {
00740     MLoopUV *mluv = dest;
00741     float *uv= mluv->uv;
00742     int i;
00743 
00744     zero_v2(uv);
00745 
00746     if (sub_weights) {
00747         const float *sub_weight = sub_weights;
00748         for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00749             float weight = weights ? weights[i] : 1.0f;
00750             MLoopUV *src = sources[i];
00751             madd_v2_v2fl(uv, src->uv, (*sub_weight) * weight);
00752             sub_weight++;
00753         }
00754     }
00755     else {
00756         for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00757             float weight = weights ? weights[i] : 1;
00758             MLoopUV *src = sources[i];
00759             madd_v2_v2fl(uv, src->uv, weight);
00760         }
00761     }
00762 }
00763 
00764 /* origspace is almost exact copy of mloopuv's, keep in sync */
00765 static void layerCopyValue_mloop_origspace(void *source, void *dest)
00766 {
00767     OrigSpaceLoop *luv1 = source, *luv2 = dest;
00768 
00769     copy_v2_v2(luv2->uv, luv1->uv);
00770 }
00771 
00772 static int layerEqual_mloop_origspace(void *data1, void *data2)
00773 {
00774     OrigSpaceLoop *luv1 = data1, *luv2 = data2;
00775 
00776     return len_squared_v2v2(luv1->uv, luv2->uv) < 0.00001f;
00777 }
00778 
00779 static void layerMultiply_mloop_origspace(void *data, float fac)
00780 {
00781     OrigSpaceLoop *luv = data;
00782 
00783     mul_v2_fl(luv->uv, fac);
00784 }
00785 
00786 static void layerInitMinMax_mloop_origspace(void *vmin, void *vmax)
00787 {
00788     OrigSpaceLoop *min = vmin, *max = vmax;
00789 
00790     INIT_MINMAX2(min->uv, max->uv);
00791 }
00792 
00793 static void layerDoMinMax_mloop_origspace(void *data, void *vmin, void *vmax)
00794 {
00795     OrigSpaceLoop *min = vmin, *max = vmax, *luv = data;
00796 
00797     DO_MINMAX2(luv->uv, min->uv, max->uv);
00798 }
00799 
00800 static void layerAdd_mloop_origspace(void *data1, void *data2)
00801 {
00802     OrigSpaceLoop *l1 = data1, *l2 = data2;
00803 
00804     add_v2_v2(l1->uv, l2->uv);
00805 }
00806 
00807 static void layerInterp_mloop_origspace(void **sources, float *weights,
00808                                 float *sub_weights, int count, void *dest)
00809 {
00810     OrigSpaceLoop *mluv = dest;
00811     float *uv= mluv->uv;
00812     int i;
00813 
00814     zero_v2(uv);
00815 
00816     if (sub_weights) {
00817         const float *sub_weight = sub_weights;
00818         for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00819             float weight = weights ? weights[i] : 1.0f;
00820             OrigSpaceLoop *src = sources[i];
00821             madd_v2_v2fl(uv, src->uv, (*sub_weight) * weight);
00822             sub_weight++;
00823         }
00824     }
00825     else {
00826         for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00827             float weight = weights ? weights[i] : 1;
00828             OrigSpaceLoop *src = sources[i];
00829             madd_v2_v2fl(uv, src->uv, weight);
00830         }
00831     }
00832 }
00833 /* --- end copy */
00834 
00835 static void layerInterp_mcol(void **sources, float *weights,
00836                              float *sub_weights, int count, void *dest)
00837 {
00838     MCol *mc = dest;
00839     int i, j, k;
00840     struct {
00841         float a;
00842         float r;
00843         float g;
00844         float b;
00845     } col[4] = {{0.0f}};
00846 
00847     float *sub_weight;
00848 
00849     if (count <= 0) return;
00850     
00851     sub_weight = sub_weights;
00852     for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00853         float weight = weights ? weights[i] : 1;
00854 
00855         for (j = 0; j < 4; ++j) {
00856             if (sub_weights) {
00857                 MCol *src = sources[i];
00858                 for (k = 0; k < 4; ++k, ++sub_weight, ++src) {
00859                     const float w= (*sub_weight) * weight;
00860                     col[j].a += src->a * w;
00861                     col[j].r += src->r * w;
00862                     col[j].g += src->g * w;
00863                     col[j].b += src->b * w;
00864                 }
00865             }
00866             else {
00867                 MCol *src = sources[i];
00868                 col[j].a += src[j].a * weight;
00869                 col[j].r += src[j].r * weight;
00870                 col[j].g += src[j].g * weight;
00871                 col[j].b += src[j].b * weight;
00872             }
00873         }
00874     }
00875 
00876     for (j = 0; j < 4; ++j) {
00877         
00878         /* Subdivide smooth or fractal can cause problems without clamping
00879          * although weights should also not cause this situation */
00880         CLAMP(col[j].a, 0.0f, 255.0f);
00881         CLAMP(col[j].r, 0.0f, 255.0f);
00882         CLAMP(col[j].g, 0.0f, 255.0f);
00883         CLAMP(col[j].b, 0.0f, 255.0f);
00884         
00885         mc[j].a = (int)col[j].a;
00886         mc[j].r = (int)col[j].r;
00887         mc[j].g = (int)col[j].g;
00888         mc[j].b = (int)col[j].b;
00889     }
00890 }
00891 
00892 static void layerSwap_mcol(void *data, const int *corner_indices)
00893 {
00894     MCol *mcol = data;
00895     MCol col[4];
00896     int j;
00897 
00898     for (j = 0; j < 4; ++j)
00899         col[j] = mcol[corner_indices[j]];
00900 
00901     memcpy(mcol, col, sizeof(col));
00902 }
00903 
00904 static void layerDefault_mcol(void *data, int count)
00905 {
00906     static MCol default_mcol = {255, 255, 255, 255};
00907     MCol *mcol = (MCol*)data;
00908     int i;
00909 
00910     for (i = 0; i < 4*count; i++) {
00911         mcol[i] = default_mcol;
00912     }
00913 }
00914 
00915 static void layerInterp_bweight(void **sources, float *weights,
00916                                 float *UNUSED(sub_weights), int count, void *dest)
00917 {
00918     float *f = dest;
00919     float **in = (float **)sources;
00920     int i;
00921     
00922     if (count <= 0) return;
00923 
00924     *f = 0.0f;
00925 
00926     if (weights) {
00927         for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00928             *f += *in[i] * weights[i];
00929         }
00930     }
00931     else {
00932         for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00933             *f += *in[i];
00934         }
00935     }
00936 }
00937 
00938 static void layerInterp_shapekey(void **sources, float *weights,
00939                                  float *UNUSED(sub_weights), int count, void *dest)
00940 {
00941     float *co = dest;
00942     float **in = (float **)sources;
00943     int i;
00944 
00945     if (count <= 0) return;
00946 
00947     zero_v3(co);
00948 
00949     if (weights) {
00950         for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00951             madd_v3_v3fl(co, in[i], weights[i]);
00952         }
00953     }
00954     else {
00955         for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00956             add_v3_v3(co, in[i]);
00957         }
00958     }
00959 }

01107 static const LayerTypeInfo *layerType_getInfo(int type)
01108 {
01109     if (type < 0 || type >= CD_NUMTYPES) return NULL;
01110 
01111     return &LAYERTYPEINFO[type];
01112 }
01113 
01114 static const char *layerType_getName(int type)
01115 {
01116     if (type < 0 || type >= CD_NUMTYPES) return NULL;
01117 
01118     return LAYERTYPENAMES[type];
01119 }

01121 /********************* CustomData functions *********************/
01122 static void customData_update_offsets(CustomData *data);
01123 
01124 static CustomDataLayer *customData_add_layer__internal(CustomData *data,
01125     int type, int alloctype, void *layerdata, int totelem, const char *name);
01126 
01127 void CustomData_update_typemap(CustomData *data)
01128 {
01129     int i, lasttype = -1;
01130 
01131     /* since we cant do in a pre-processor do here as an assert */
01132     BLI_assert(sizeof(data->typemap) / sizeof(int) >= CD_NUMTYPES);
01133 
01134     for (i=0; i<CD_NUMTYPES; i++) {
01135         data->typemap[i] = -1;
01136     }
01137 
01138     for (i=0; i<data->totlayer; i++) {
01139         if (data->layers[i].type != lasttype) {
01140             data->typemap[data->layers[i].type] = i;
01141         }
01142         lasttype = data->layers[i].type;
01143     }
01144 }
01145 
01146 void CustomData_merge(const struct CustomData *source, struct CustomData *dest,
01147                       CustomDataMask mask, int alloctype, int totelem)
01148 {
01149     /*const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;*/
01150     CustomDataLayer *layer, *newlayer;
01151     void *data;
01152     int i, type, number = 0, lasttype = -1, lastactive = 0, lastrender = 0, lastclone = 0, lastmask = 0, lastflag = 0;
01153 
01154     for (i = 0; i < source->totlayer; ++i) {
01155         layer = &source->layers[i];
01156         /*typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);*/ /*UNUSED*/
01157 
01158         type = layer->type;
01159 
01160         if (type != lasttype) {
01161             number = 0;
01162             lastactive = layer->active;
01163             lastrender = layer->active_rnd;
01164             lastclone = layer->active_clone;
01165             lastmask = layer->active_mask;
01166             lasttype = type;
01167             lastflag = layer->flag;
01168         }
01169         else
01170             number++;
01171 
01172         if (lastflag & CD_FLAG_NOCOPY) continue;
01173         else if (!(mask & CD_TYPE_AS_MASK(type))) continue;
01174         else if (number < CustomData_number_of_layers(dest, type)) continue;
01175 
01176         switch (alloctype) {
01177             case CD_ASSIGN:
01178             case CD_REFERENCE:
01179             case CD_DUPLICATE:
01180                 data = layer->data;
01181                 break;
01182             default:
01183                 data = NULL;
01184                 break;
01185         }
01186 
01187         if ((alloctype == CD_ASSIGN) && (lastflag & CD_FLAG_NOFREE))
01188             newlayer = customData_add_layer__internal(dest, type, CD_REFERENCE,
01189                 data, totelem, layer->name);
01190         else
01191             newlayer = customData_add_layer__internal(dest, type, alloctype,
01192                 data, totelem, layer->name);
01193         
01194         if (newlayer) {
01195             newlayer->uid = layer->uid;
01196             
01197             newlayer->active = lastactive;
01198             newlayer->active_rnd = lastrender;
01199             newlayer->active_clone = lastclone;
01200             newlayer->active_mask = lastmask;
01201             newlayer->flag |= lastflag & (CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL|CD_FLAG_IN_MEMORY);
01202         }
01203     }
01204 
01205     CustomData_update_typemap(dest);
01206 }
01207 
01208 void CustomData_copy(const struct CustomData *source, struct CustomData *dest,
01209                      CustomDataMask mask, int alloctype, int totelem)
01210 {
01211     memset(dest, 0, sizeof(*dest));
01212 
01213     if (source->external)
01214         dest->external= MEM_dupallocN(source->external);
01215 
01216     CustomData_merge(source, dest, mask, alloctype, totelem);
01217 }
01218 
01219 static void customData_free_layer__internal(CustomDataLayer *layer, int totelem)
01220 {
01221     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
01222 
01223     if (!(layer->flag & CD_FLAG_NOFREE) && layer->data) {
01224         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
01225 
01226         if (typeInfo->free)
01227             typeInfo->free(layer->data, totelem, typeInfo->size);
01228 
01229         if (layer->data)
01230             MEM_freeN(layer->data);
01231     }
01232 }
01233 
01234 static void CustomData_external_free(CustomData *data)
01235 {
01236     if (data->external) {
01237         MEM_freeN(data->external);
01238         data->external= NULL;
01239     }
01240 }
01241 
01242 void CustomData_free(CustomData *data, int totelem)
01243 {
01244     int i;
01245 
01246     for (i = 0; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
01247         customData_free_layer__internal(&data->layers[i], totelem);
01248 
01249     if (data->layers)
01250         MEM_freeN(data->layers);
01251     
01252     CustomData_external_free(data);
01253     
01254     memset(data, 0, sizeof(*data));
01255 }
01256 
01257 static void customData_update_offsets(CustomData *data)
01258 {
01259     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
01260     int i, offset = 0;
01261 
01262     for (i = 0; i < data->totlayer; ++i) {
01263         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(data->layers[i].type);
01264 
01265         data->layers[i].offset = offset;
01266         offset += typeInfo->size;
01267     }
01268 
01269     data->totsize = offset;
01270     CustomData_update_typemap(data);
01271 }
01272 
01273 int CustomData_get_layer_index(const CustomData *data, int type)
01274 {
01275     int i; 
01276 
01277     for (i=0; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
01278         if (data->layers[i].type == type)
01279             return i;
01280 
01281     return -1;
01282 }
01283 
01284 int CustomData_get_layer_index_n(const struct CustomData *data, int type, int n)
01285 {
01286     int i = CustomData_get_layer_index(data, type);
01287 
01288     if (i != -1) {
01289         i = (data->layers[i + n].type == type) ? (i + n) : (-1);
01290     }
01291 
01292     return i;
01293 }
01294 
01295 int CustomData_get_named_layer_index(const CustomData *data, int type, const char *name)
01296 {
01297     int i;
01298 
01299     for (i=0; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
01300         if (data->layers[i].type == type && strcmp(data->layers[i].name, name)==0)
01301             return i;
01302 
01303     return -1;
01304 }
01305 
01306 int CustomData_get_active_layer_index(const CustomData *data, int type)
01307 {
01308     if (!data->totlayer)
01309         return -1;
01310 
01311     if (data->typemap[type] != -1) {
01312         return data->typemap[type] + data->layers[data->typemap[type]].active;
01313     }
01314 
01315     return -1;
01316 }
01317 
01318 int CustomData_get_render_layer_index(const CustomData *data, int type)
01319 {
01320     int i;
01321 
01322     for (i=0; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
01323         if (data->layers[i].type == type)
01324             return i + data->layers[i].active_rnd;
01325 
01326     return -1;
01327 }
01328 
01329 int CustomData_get_clone_layer_index(const CustomData *data, int type)
01330 {
01331     int i;
01332 
01333     for (i=0; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
01334         if (data->layers[i].type == type)
01335             return i + data->layers[i].active_clone;
01336 
01337     return -1;
01338 }
01339 
01340 int CustomData_get_stencil_layer_index(const CustomData *data, int type)
01341 {
01342     int i;
01343 
01344     for (i=0; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
01345         if (data->layers[i].type == type)
01346             return i + data->layers[i].active_mask;
01347 
01348     return -1;
01349 }
01350 
01351 int CustomData_get_active_layer(const CustomData *data, int type)

01353     int i;
01354 
01355     for (i=0; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
01356         if (data->layers[i].type == type)
01357             return data->layers[i].active;
01358 
01359     return -1;
01360 }

01367         if (data->layers[i].type == type)
01368             return data->layers[i].active_rnd;

01370     return -1;
01371 }

01431 /* for using with an index from CustomData_get_active_layer_index and CustomData_get_render_layer_index */
01432 void CustomData_set_layer_active_index(CustomData *data, int type, int n)
01433 {
01434     int i;
01435 
01436     for (i=0; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
01437         if (data->layers[i].type == type)
01438             data->layers[i].active = n-i;
01439 }

01467 
01468 void CustomData_set_layer_flag(struct CustomData *data, int type, int flag)
01469 {
01470     int i;
01471 
01472     for (i=0; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
01473         if (data->layers[i].type == type)
01474             data->layers[i].flag |= flag;
01475 }
01476 
01477 static int customData_resize(CustomData *data, int amount)
01478 {
01479     CustomDataLayer *tmp = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*tmp)*(data->maxlayer + amount),
01480                                        "CustomData->layers");
01481     if (!tmp) return 0;
01482 
01483     data->maxlayer += amount;
01484     if (data->layers) {
01485         memcpy(tmp, data->layers, sizeof(*tmp) * data->totlayer);
01486         MEM_freeN(data->layers);
01487     }
01488     data->layers = tmp;
01489 
01490     return 1;
01491 }
01492 
01493 static CustomDataLayer *customData_add_layer__internal(CustomData *data,
01494     int type, int alloctype, void *layerdata, int totelem, const char *name)
01495 {
01496     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo= layerType_getInfo(type);
01497     int size = typeInfo->size * totelem, flag = 0, index = data->totlayer;
01498     void *newlayerdata = NULL;
01499 
01500     /* Passing a layerdata to copy from with an alloctype that won't copy is
01501      * most likely a bug */
01502     BLI_assert(!layerdata ||
01503                (alloctype == CD_ASSIGN) ||
01504                (alloctype == CD_DUPLICATE) ||
01505                (alloctype == CD_REFERENCE));
01506 
01507     if (!typeInfo->defaultname && CustomData_has_layer(data, type))
01508         return &data->layers[CustomData_get_layer_index(data, type)];
01509 
01510     if ((alloctype == CD_ASSIGN) || (alloctype == CD_REFERENCE)) {
01511         newlayerdata = layerdata;
01512     }
01513     else if (size > 0) {
01514         newlayerdata = MEM_callocN(size, layerType_getName(type));
01515         if (!newlayerdata)
01516             return NULL;
01517     }
01518 
01519     if (alloctype == CD_DUPLICATE && layerdata) {
01520         if (typeInfo->copy)
01521             typeInfo->copy(layerdata, newlayerdata, totelem);
01522         else
01523             memcpy(newlayerdata, layerdata, size);
01524     }
01525     else if (alloctype == CD_DEFAULT) {
01526         if (typeInfo->set_default)
01527             typeInfo->set_default((char*)newlayerdata, totelem);
01528     }
01529     else if (alloctype == CD_REFERENCE)
01530         flag |= CD_FLAG_NOFREE;
01531 
01532     if (index >= data->maxlayer) {
01533         if (!customData_resize(data, CUSTOMDATA_GROW)) {
01534             if (newlayerdata != layerdata)
01535                 MEM_freeN(newlayerdata);
01536             return NULL;
01537         }
01538     }
01539     
01540     data->totlayer++;
01541 
01542     /* keep layers ordered by type */
01543     for ( ; index > 0 && data->layers[index - 1].type > type; --index)
01544         data->layers[index] = data->layers[index - 1];
01545 
01546     data->layers[index].type = type;
01547     data->layers[index].flag = flag;
01548     data->layers[index].data = newlayerdata;
01549 
01550     if (name || (name=typeInfo->defaultname)) {
01551         BLI_strncpy(data->layers[index].name, name, sizeof(data->layers[index].name));
01552         CustomData_set_layer_unique_name(data, index);
01553     }
01554     else
01555         data->layers[index].name[0] = '\0';
01556 
01557     if (index > 0 && data->layers[index-1].type == type) {
01558         data->layers[index].active = data->layers[index-1].active;
01559         data->layers[index].active_rnd = data->layers[index-1].active_rnd;
01560         data->layers[index].active_clone = data->layers[index-1].active_clone;
01561         data->layers[index].active_mask = data->layers[index-1].active_mask;
01562     }
01563     else {
01564         data->layers[index].active = 0;
01565         data->layers[index].active_rnd = 0;
01566         data->layers[index].active_clone = 0;
01567         data->layers[index].active_mask = 0;
01568     }
01569     
01570     customData_update_offsets(data);
01571 
01572     return &data->layers[index];
01573 }
01574 
01575 void *CustomData_add_layer(CustomData *data, int type, int alloctype,
01576                            void *layerdata, int totelem)
01577 {
01578     CustomDataLayer *layer;
01579     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo= layerType_getInfo(type);
01580     
01581     layer = customData_add_layer__internal(data, type, alloctype, layerdata,
01582                                            totelem, typeInfo->defaultname);
01583     CustomData_update_typemap(data);
01584 
01585     if (layer)
01586         return layer->data;
01587 
01588     return NULL;
01589 }
01590 
01591 /*same as above but accepts a name*/
01592 void *CustomData_add_layer_named(CustomData *data, int type, int alloctype,
01593                            void *layerdata, int totelem, const char *name)
01594 {
01595     CustomDataLayer *layer;
01596     
01597     layer = customData_add_layer__internal(data, type, alloctype, layerdata,
01598                                            totelem, name);
01599     CustomData_update_typemap(data);
01600 
01601     if (layer)
01602         return layer->data;
01603 
01604     return NULL;
01605 }
01606 
01607 
01608 int CustomData_free_layer(CustomData *data, int type, int totelem, int index)
01609 {
01610     int i;
01611     
01612     if (index < 0) return 0;
01613 
01614     customData_free_layer__internal(&data->layers[index], totelem);
01615 
01616     for (i=index+1; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
01617         data->layers[i-1] = data->layers[i];
01618 
01619     data->totlayer--;
01620 
01621     /* if layer was last of type in array, set new active layer */
01622     if ((index >= data->totlayer) || (data->layers[index].type != type)) {
01623         i = CustomData_get_layer_index(data, type);
01624         
01625         if (i >= 0)
01626             for (; i < data->totlayer && data->layers[i].type == type; i++) {
01627                 data->layers[i].active--;
01628                 data->layers[i].active_rnd--;
01629                 data->layers[i].active_clone--;
01630                 data->layers[i].active_mask--;
01631             }
01632     }
01633 
01634     if (data->totlayer <= data->maxlayer-CUSTOMDATA_GROW)
01635         customData_resize(data, -CUSTOMDATA_GROW);
01636 
01637     customData_update_offsets(data);
01638     CustomData_update_typemap(data);
01639 
01640     return 1;
01641 }
01642 
01643 int CustomData_free_layer_active(CustomData *data, int type, int totelem)
01644 {
01645     int index = 0;
01646     index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type);
01647     if (index < 0) return 0;
01648     return CustomData_free_layer(data, type, totelem, index);
01649 }
01650 
01651 
01652 void CustomData_free_layers(CustomData *data, int type, int totelem)
01653 {
01654     while (CustomData_has_layer(data, type))
01655         CustomData_free_layer_active(data, type, totelem);
01656 }
01657 
01658 int CustomData_has_layer(const CustomData *data, int type)
01659 {
01660     return (CustomData_get_layer_index(data, type) != -1);
01661 }
01662 
01663 int CustomData_number_of_layers(const CustomData *data, int type)
01664 {
01665     int i, number = 0;
01666 
01667     for (i = 0; i < data->totlayer; i++)
01668         if (data->layers[i].type == type)
01669             number++;
01670     
01671     return number;
01672 }
01673 
01674 void *CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer(struct CustomData *data, const int type, const int totelem)
01675 {
01676     CustomDataLayer *layer;
01677     int layer_index;
01678 
01679     /* get the layer index of the first layer of type */
01680     layer_index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type);
01681     if (layer_index < 0) return NULL;
01682 
01683     layer = &data->layers[layer_index];
01684 
01685     if (layer->flag & CD_FLAG_NOFREE) {
01686         /* MEM_dupallocN won't work in case of complex layers, like e.g.
01687          * CD_MDEFORMVERT, which has pointers to allocated data...
01688          * So in case a custom copy function is defined, use it!
01689          */
01690         const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
01691 
01692         if (typeInfo->copy) {
01693             char *dest_data = MEM_mallocN(typeInfo->size * totelem, "CD duplicate ref layer");
01694             typeInfo->copy(layer->data, dest_data, totelem);
01695             layer->data = dest_data;
01696         }
01697         else
01698             layer->data = MEM_dupallocN(layer->data);
01699 
01700         layer->flag &= ~CD_FLAG_NOFREE;
01701     }
01702 
01703     return layer->data;
01704 }
01705 
01706 void *CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer_named(struct CustomData *data,
01707                                                   const int type, const char *name, const int totelem)
01708 {
01709     CustomDataLayer *layer;
01710     int layer_index;
01711 
01712     /* get the layer index of the desired layer */
01713     layer_index = CustomData_get_named_layer_index(data, type, name);
01714     if (layer_index < 0) return NULL;
01715 
01716     layer = &data->layers[layer_index];
01717 
01718     if (layer->flag & CD_FLAG_NOFREE) {
01719         /* MEM_dupallocN won't work in case of complex layers, like e.g.
01720          * CD_MDEFORMVERT, which has pointers to allocated data...
01721          * So in case a custom copy function is defined, use it!
01722          */
01723         const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
01724 
01725         if (typeInfo->copy) {
01726             char *dest_data = MEM_mallocN(typeInfo->size * totelem, "CD duplicate ref layer");
01727             typeInfo->copy(layer->data, dest_data, totelem);
01728             layer->data = dest_data;
01729         }
01730         else
01731             layer->data = MEM_dupallocN(layer->data);
01732 
01733         layer->flag &= ~CD_FLAG_NOFREE;
01734     }
01735 
01736     return layer->data;
01737 }
01738 
01739 int CustomData_is_referenced_layer(struct CustomData *data, int type)
01740 {
01741     CustomDataLayer *layer;
01742     int layer_index;
01743 
01744     /* get the layer index of the first layer of type */
01745     layer_index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type);
01746     if (layer_index < 0) return 0;
01747 
01748     layer = &data->layers[layer_index];
01749 
01750     return (layer->flag & CD_FLAG_NOFREE) != 0;
01751 }
01752 
01753 void CustomData_free_temporary(CustomData *data, int totelem)
01754 {
01755     CustomDataLayer *layer;
01756     int i, j;
01757 
01758     for (i = 0, j = 0; i < data->totlayer; ++i) {
01759         layer = &data->layers[i];
01760 
01761         if (i != j)
01762             data->layers[j] = data->layers[i];
01763 
01764         if ((layer->flag & CD_FLAG_TEMPORARY) == CD_FLAG_TEMPORARY)
01765             customData_free_layer__internal(layer, totelem);
01766         else
01767             j++;
01768     }
01769 
01770     data->totlayer = j;
01771 
01772     if (data->totlayer <= data->maxlayer-CUSTOMDATA_GROW)
01773         customData_resize(data, -CUSTOMDATA_GROW);
01774 
01775     customData_update_offsets(data);
01776 }
01777 
01778 void CustomData_set_only_copy(const struct CustomData *data,
01779                               CustomDataMask mask)
01780 {
01781     int i;
01782 
01783     for (i = 0; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
01784         if (!(mask & CD_TYPE_AS_MASK(data->layers[i].type)))
01785             data->layers[i].flag |= CD_FLAG_NOCOPY;
01786 }
01787 
01788 void CustomData_copy_elements(int type, void *source, void *dest, int count)
01789 {
01790     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(type);
01791 
01792     if (typeInfo->copy)
01793         typeInfo->copy(source, dest, count);
01794     else
01795         memcpy(dest, source, typeInfo->size*count);
01796 }
01797 
01798 void CustomData_copy_data(const CustomData *source, CustomData *dest,
01799                           int source_index, int dest_index, int count)
01800 {
01801     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
01802     int src_i, dest_i;
01803     int src_offset;
01804     int dest_offset;
01805 
01806     /* copies a layer at a time */
01807     dest_i = 0;
01808     for (src_i = 0; src_i < source->totlayer; ++src_i) {
01809 
01810         /* find the first dest layer with type >= the source type
01811          * (this should work because layers are ordered by type)
01812          */
01813         while (dest_i < dest->totlayer && dest->layers[dest_i].type < source->layers[src_i].type) {
01814             ++dest_i;
01815         }
01816 
01817         /* if there are no more dest layers, we're done */
01818         if (dest_i >= dest->totlayer) return;
01819 
01820         /* if we found a matching layer, copy the data */
01821         if (dest->layers[dest_i].type == source->layers[src_i].type) {
01822             char *src_data = source->layers[src_i].data;
01823             char *dest_data = dest->layers[dest_i].data;
01824 
01825             typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(source->layers[src_i].type);
01826 
01827             src_offset = source_index * typeInfo->size;
01828             dest_offset = dest_index * typeInfo->size;
01829             
01830             if (!src_data || !dest_data) {
01831                 if (src_data != NULL && dest_data != NULL) {
01832                     printf("%s: warning null data for %s type (%p --> %p), skipping\n",
01833                            __func__, layerType_getName(source->layers[src_i].type),
01834                            (void *)src_data, (void *)dest_data);
01835                 }
01836                 continue;
01837             }
01838             
01839             if (typeInfo->copy)
01840                 typeInfo->copy(src_data + src_offset,
01841                                 dest_data + dest_offset,
01842                                 count);
01843             else
01844                 memcpy(dest_data + dest_offset,
01845                        src_data + src_offset,
01846                        count * typeInfo->size);
01847 
01848             /* if there are multiple source & dest layers of the same type,
01849              * we don't want to copy all source layers to the same dest, so
01850              * increment dest_i
01851              */
01852             ++dest_i;
01853         }
01854     }
01855 }
01856 
01857 void CustomData_free_elem(CustomData *data, int index, int count)
01858 {
01859     int i;
01860     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
01861 
01862     for (i = 0; i < data->totlayer; ++i) {
01863         if (!(data->layers[i].flag & CD_FLAG_NOFREE)) {
01864             typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(data->layers[i].type);
01865 
01866             if (typeInfo->free) {
01867                 int offset = typeInfo->size * index;
01868 
01869                 typeInfo->free((char *)data->layers[i].data + offset,
01870                                count, typeInfo->size);
01871             }
01872         }
01873     }
01874 }
01875 
01876 #define SOURCE_BUF_SIZE 100
01877 
01878 void CustomData_interp(const CustomData *source, CustomData *dest,
01879                        int *src_indices, float *weights, float *sub_weights,
01880                        int count, int dest_index)
01881 {
01882     int src_i, dest_i;
01883     int dest_offset;
01884     int j;
01885     void *source_buf[SOURCE_BUF_SIZE];
01886     void **sources = source_buf;
01887 
01888     /* slow fallback in case we're interpolating a ridiculous number of
01889      * elements
01890      */
01891     if (count > SOURCE_BUF_SIZE)
01892         sources = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*sources) * count,
01893                               "CustomData_interp sources");
01894 
01895     /* interpolates a layer at a time */
01896     dest_i = 0;
01897     for (src_i = 0; src_i < source->totlayer; ++src_i) {
01898         const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo= layerType_getInfo(source->layers[src_i].type);
01899         if (!typeInfo->interp) continue;
01900 
01901         /* find the first dest layer with type >= the source type
01902          * (this should work because layers are ordered by type)
01903          */
01904         while (dest_i < dest->totlayer && dest->layers[dest_i].type < source->layers[src_i].type) {
01905             ++dest_i;
01906         }
01907 
01908         /* if there are no more dest layers, we're done */
01909         if (dest_i >= dest->totlayer) return;
01910 
01911         /* if we found a matching layer, copy the data */
01912         if (dest->layers[dest_i].type == source->layers[src_i].type) {
01913             void *src_data = source->layers[src_i].data;
01914 
01915             for (j = 0; j < count; ++j)
01916                 sources[j] = (char *)src_data
01917                              + typeInfo->size * src_indices[j];
01918 
01919             dest_offset = dest_index * typeInfo->size;
01920 
01921             typeInfo->interp(sources, weights, sub_weights, count,
01922                            (char *)dest->layers[dest_i].data + dest_offset);
01923 
01924             /* if there are multiple source & dest layers of the same type,
01925              * we don't want to copy all source layers to the same dest, so
01926              * increment dest_i
01927              */
01928             ++dest_i;
01929         }
01930     }
01931 
01932     if (count > SOURCE_BUF_SIZE) MEM_freeN(sources);
01933 }
01934 
01935 void CustomData_swap(struct CustomData *data, int index, const int *corner_indices)
01936 {
01937     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
01938     int i;
01939 
01940     for (i = 0; i < data->totlayer; ++i) {
01941         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(data->layers[i].type);
01942 
01943         if (typeInfo->swap) {
01944             int offset = typeInfo->size * index;
01945 
01946             typeInfo->swap((char *)data->layers[i].data + offset, corner_indices);
01947         }
01948     }
01949 }
01950 
01951 void *CustomData_get(const CustomData *data, int index, int type)
01952 {
01953     int offset;
01954     int layer_index;
01955     
01956     /* get the layer index of the active layer of type */
01957     layer_index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type);
01958     if (layer_index < 0) return NULL;
01959 
01960     /* get the offset of the desired element */
01961     offset = layerType_getInfo(type)->size * index;
01962 
01963     return (char *)data->layers[layer_index].data + offset;
01964 }
01965 
01966 void *CustomData_get_n(const CustomData *data, int type, int index, int n)
01967 {
01968     int layer_index;
01969     int offset;
01970 
01971     /* get the layer index of the first layer of type */
01972     layer_index = data->typemap[type];
01973     if (layer_index < 0) return NULL;
01974 
01975     offset = layerType_getInfo(type)->size * index;
01976     return (char *)data->layers[layer_index+n].data + offset;
01977 }
01978 
01979 void *CustomData_get_layer(const CustomData *data, int type)
01980 {
01981     /* get the layer index of the active layer of type */
01982     int layer_index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type);
01983     if (layer_index < 0) return NULL;
01984 
01985     return data->layers[layer_index].data;
01986 }
01987 
01988 void *CustomData_get_layer_n(const CustomData *data, int type, int n)
01989 {
01990     /* get the layer index of the active layer of type */
01991     int layer_index = CustomData_get_layer_index_n(data, type, n);
01992     if (layer_index < 0) return NULL;
01993 
01994     return data->layers[layer_index].data;
01995 }
01996 
01997 void *CustomData_get_layer_named(const struct CustomData *data, int type,
01998                                  const char *name)
01999 {
02000     int layer_index = CustomData_get_named_layer_index(data, type, name);
02001     if (layer_index < 0) return NULL;
02002 
02003     return data->layers[layer_index].data;
02004 }
02005 
02006 
02007 int CustomData_set_layer_name(const CustomData *data, int type, int n, const char *name)
02008 {
02009     /* get the layer index of the first layer of type */
02010     int layer_index = CustomData_get_layer_index_n(data, type, n);
02011 
02012     if (layer_index < 0) return 0;
02013     if (!name) return 0;
02014     
02015     strcpy(data->layers[layer_index].name, name);
02016     
02017     return 1;
02018 }
02019 
02020 void *CustomData_set_layer(const CustomData *data, int type, void *ptr)
02021 {
02022     /* get the layer index of the first layer of type */
02023     int layer_index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type);
02024 
02025     if (layer_index < 0) return NULL;
02026 
02027     data->layers[layer_index].data = ptr;
02028 
02029     return ptr;
02030 }
02031 
02032 void *CustomData_set_layer_n(const struct CustomData *data, int type, int n, void *ptr)
02033 {
02034     /* get the layer index of the first layer of type */
02035     int layer_index = CustomData_get_layer_index_n(data, type, n);
02036     if (layer_index < 0) return NULL;
02037 
02038     data->layers[layer_index].data = ptr;
02039 
02040     return ptr;
02041 }
02042 
02043 void CustomData_set(const CustomData *data, int index, int type, void *source)
02044 {
02045     void *dest = CustomData_get(data, index, type);
02046     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(type);
02047 
02048     if (!dest) return;
02049 
02050     if (typeInfo->copy)
02051         typeInfo->copy(source, dest, 1);
02052     else
02053         memcpy(dest, source, typeInfo->size);
02054 }
02055 
02056 /*Bmesh functions*/
02057 /*needed to convert to/from different face reps*/
02058 void CustomData_to_bmeshpoly(CustomData *fdata, CustomData *pdata, CustomData *ldata,
02059                              int totloop, int totpoly)
02060 {
02061     int i;
02062     for (i=0; i < fdata->totlayer; i++) {
02063         if (fdata->layers[i].type == CD_MTFACE) {
02064             CustomData_add_layer_named(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totpoly, fdata->layers[i].name);
02065             CustomData_add_layer_named(ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totloop, fdata->layers[i].name);
02066         }
02067         else if (fdata->layers[i].type == CD_MCOL) {
02068             CustomData_add_layer_named(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totloop, fdata->layers[i].name);
02069         }
02070         else if (fdata->layers[i].type == CD_MDISPS) {
02071             CustomData_add_layer_named(ldata, CD_MDISPS, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totloop, fdata->layers[i].name);
02072         }
02073     }
02074 }
02075 
02076 void CustomData_from_bmeshpoly(CustomData *fdata, CustomData *pdata, CustomData *ldata, int total)
02077 {
02078     int i;
02079     for (i=0; i < pdata->totlayer; i++) {
02080         if (pdata->layers[i].type == CD_MTEXPOLY) {
02081             CustomData_add_layer_named(fdata, CD_MTFACE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, total, pdata->layers[i].name);
02082         }
02083     }
02084     for (i=0; i < ldata->totlayer; i++) {
02085         if (ldata->layers[i].type == CD_MLOOPCOL) {
02086             CustomData_add_layer_named(fdata, CD_MCOL, CD_CALLOC, NULL, total, ldata->layers[i].name);
02087         }
02088         else if (ldata->layers[i].type == CD_PREVIEW_MLOOPCOL) {
02089             CustomData_add_layer_named(fdata, CD_PREVIEW_MCOL, CD_CALLOC, NULL, total, ldata->layers[i].name);
02090         }
02091         else if (ldata->layers[i].type == CD_ORIGSPACE_MLOOP) {
02092             CustomData_add_layer_named(fdata, CD_ORIGSPACE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, total, ldata->layers[i].name);
02093         }
02094     }
02095 
02096     CustomData_bmesh_update_active_layers(fdata, pdata, ldata);
02097 }
02098 
02099 void CustomData_bmesh_update_active_layers(CustomData *fdata, CustomData *pdata, CustomData *ldata)
02100 {
02101     int act;
02102 
02103     if (CustomData_has_layer(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY)) {
02104         act = CustomData_get_active_layer(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02105         CustomData_set_layer_active(ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, act);
02106         CustomData_set_layer_active(fdata, CD_MTFACE, act);
02107 
02108         act = CustomData_get_render_layer(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02109         CustomData_set_layer_render(ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, act);
02110         CustomData_set_layer_render(fdata, CD_MTFACE, act);
02111 
02112         act = CustomData_get_clone_layer(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02113         CustomData_set_layer_clone(ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, act);
02114         CustomData_set_layer_clone(fdata, CD_MTFACE, act);
02115 
02116         act = CustomData_get_stencil_layer(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02117         CustomData_set_layer_stencil(ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, act);
02118         CustomData_set_layer_stencil(fdata, CD_MTFACE, act);
02119     }
02120 
02121     if (CustomData_has_layer(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL)) {
02122         act = CustomData_get_active_layer(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
02123         CustomData_set_layer_active(fdata, CD_MCOL, act);
02124 
02125         act = CustomData_get_render_layer(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
02126         CustomData_set_layer_render(fdata, CD_MCOL, act);
02127 
02128         act = CustomData_get_clone_layer(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
02129         CustomData_set_layer_clone(fdata, CD_MCOL, act);
02130 
02131         act = CustomData_get_stencil_layer(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
02132         CustomData_set_layer_stencil(fdata, CD_MCOL, act);
02133     }
02134 }
02135 
02136 void CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(CustomData *data, int totelem, const char htype)
02137 {
02138     int chunksize;
02139 
02140     /* Dispose old pools before calling here to avoid leaks */
02141     BLI_assert(data->pool == NULL);
02142 
02143     switch (htype) {
02144         case BM_VERT: chunksize = bm_mesh_chunksize_default.totvert;  break;
02145         case BM_EDGE: chunksize = bm_mesh_chunksize_default.totedge;  break;
02146         case BM_LOOP: chunksize = bm_mesh_chunksize_default.totloop;  break;
02147         case BM_FACE: chunksize = bm_mesh_chunksize_default.totface;  break;
02148         default:
02149             BLI_assert(0);
02150             chunksize = 512;
02151             break;
02152     }
02153 
02154     /* If there are no layers, no pool is needed just yet */
02155     if (data->totlayer) {
02156         data->pool = BLI_mempool_create(data->totsize, totelem, chunksize, BLI_MEMPOOL_SYSMALLOC);
02157     }
02158 }
02159 
02160 void CustomData_bmesh_merge(CustomData *source, CustomData *dest, 
02161                             CustomDataMask mask, int alloctype, BMesh *bm, const char htype)
02162 {
02163     BMHeader *h;
02164     BMIter iter;
02165     CustomData destold;
02166     void *tmp;
02167     int t;
02168 
02169     /* copy old layer description so that old data can be copied into
02170      * the new allocation */
02171     destold = *dest;
02172     if (destold.layers) destold.layers = MEM_dupallocN(destold.layers);
02173     
02174     CustomData_merge(source, dest, mask, alloctype, 0);
02175     dest->pool = NULL;
02176     CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(dest, 512, htype);
02177 
02178     switch (htype) {
02179         case BM_VERT:
02180             t = BM_VERTS_OF_MESH; break;
02181         case BM_EDGE:
02182             t = BM_EDGES_OF_MESH; break;
02183         case BM_LOOP:
02184             t = BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE; break;
02185         case BM_FACE:
02186             t = BM_FACES_OF_MESH; break;
02187         default: /* should never happen */
02188             BLI_assert(!"invalid type given");
02189             t = BM_VERTS_OF_MESH;
02190     }
02191 
02192     if (t != BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02193         /*ensure all current elements follow new customdata layout*/
02194         BM_ITER_MESH (h, &iter, bm, t) {
02195             tmp = NULL;
02196             CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(&destold, dest, h->data, &tmp);
02197             CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&destold, &h->data);
02198             h->data = tmp;
02199         }
02200     }
02201     else {
02202         BMFace *f;
02203         BMLoop *l;
02204         BMIter liter;
02205 
02206         /*ensure all current elements follow new customdata layout*/
02207         BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02208             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02209                 tmp = NULL;
02210                 CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(&destold, dest, l->head.data, &tmp);
02211                 CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&destold, &l->head.data);
02212                 l->head.data = tmp;
02213             }
02214         }
02215     }
02216 
02217     if (destold.pool) BLI_mempool_destroy(destold.pool);
02218     if (destold.layers) MEM_freeN(destold.layers);
02219 }
02220 
02221 void CustomData_bmesh_free_block(CustomData *data, void **block)
02222 {
02223     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
02224     int i;
02225 
02226     if (!*block) return;
02227     for (i = 0; i < data->totlayer; ++i) {
02228         if (!(data->layers[i].flag & CD_FLAG_NOFREE)) {
02229             typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(data->layers[i].type);
02230 
02231             if (typeInfo->free) {
02232                 int offset = data->layers[i].offset;
02233                 typeInfo->free((char*)*block + offset, 1, typeInfo->size);
02234             }
02235         }
02236     }
02237 
02238     if (data->totsize)
02239         BLI_mempool_free(data->pool, *block);
02240 
02241     *block = NULL;
02242 }
02243 
02244 static void CustomData_bmesh_alloc_block(CustomData *data, void **block)
02245 {
02246 
02247     if (*block)
02248         CustomData_bmesh_free_block(data, block);
02249 
02250     if (data->totsize > 0)
02251         *block = BLI_mempool_alloc(data->pool);
02252     else
02253         *block = NULL;
02254 }
02255 
02256 void CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(const CustomData *source, CustomData *dest,
02257                             void *src_block, void **dest_block)
02258 {
02259     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
02260     int dest_i, src_i;
02261 
02262     if (!*dest_block) {
02263         CustomData_bmesh_alloc_block(dest, dest_block);
02264         if (*dest_block)
02265             memset(*dest_block, 0, dest->totsize);
02266     }
02267     
02268     /* copies a layer at a time */
02269     dest_i = 0;
02270     for (src_i = 0; src_i < source->totlayer; ++src_i) {
02271 
02272         /* find the first dest layer with type >= the source type
02273          * (this should work because layers are ordered by type)
02274          */
02275         while (dest_i < dest->totlayer && dest->layers[dest_i].type < source->layers[src_i].type) {
02276             ++dest_i;
02277         }
02278 
02279         /* if there are no more dest layers, we're done */
02280         if (dest_i >= dest->totlayer) return;
02281 
02282         /* if we found a matching layer, copy the data */
02283         if (dest->layers[dest_i].type == source->layers[src_i].type &&
02284             strcmp(dest->layers[dest_i].name, source->layers[src_i].name) == 0) {
02285             char *src_data = (char*)src_block + source->layers[src_i].offset;
02286             char *dest_data = (char*)*dest_block + dest->layers[dest_i].offset;
02287 
02288             typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(source->layers[src_i].type);
02289 
02290             if (typeInfo->copy)
02291                 typeInfo->copy(src_data, dest_data, 1);
02292             else
02293                 memcpy(dest_data, src_data, typeInfo->size);
02294 
02295             /* if there are multiple source & dest layers of the same type,
02296              * we don't want to copy all source layers to the same dest, so
02297              * increment dest_i
02298              */
02299             ++dest_i;
02300         }
02301     }
02302 }
02303 
02304 /*Bmesh Custom Data Functions. Should replace editmesh ones with these as well, due to more effecient memory alloc*/
02305 void *CustomData_bmesh_get(const CustomData *data, void *block, int type)
02306 {
02307     int layer_index;
02308     
02309     /* get the layer index of the first layer of type */
02310     layer_index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type);
02311     if (layer_index < 0) return NULL;
02312 
02313     return (char *)block + data->layers[layer_index].offset;
02314 }
02315 
02316 void *CustomData_bmesh_get_n(const CustomData *data, void *block, int type, int n)
02317 {
02318     int layer_index;
02319     
02320     /* get the layer index of the first layer of type */
02321     layer_index = CustomData_get_layer_index(data, type);
02322     if (layer_index < 0) return NULL;
02323 
02324     return (char *)block + data->layers[layer_index+n].offset;
02325 }
02326 
02327 /*gets from the layer at physical index n, note: doesn't check type.*/
02328 void *CustomData_bmesh_get_layer_n(const CustomData *data, void *block, int n)
02329 {
02330     if (n < 0 || n >= data->totlayer) return NULL;
02331 
02332     return (char *)block + data->layers[n].offset;
02333 }
02334 
02335 int CustomData_layer_has_math(struct CustomData *data, int layer_n)
02336 {
02337     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(data->layers[layer_n].type);
02338     
02339     if (typeInfo->equal && typeInfo->add && typeInfo->multiply && 
02340         typeInfo->initminmax && typeInfo->dominmax) return 1;
02341     
02342     return 0;
02343 }
02344 
02345 /* copies the "value" (e.g. mloopuv uv or mloopcol colors) from one block to
02346  * another, while not overwriting anything else (e.g. flags)*/
02347 void CustomData_data_copy_value(int type, void *source, void *dest)
02348 {
02349     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(type);
02350 
02351     if (!dest) return;
02352 
02353     if (typeInfo->copyvalue)
02354         typeInfo->copyvalue(source, dest);
02355     else
02356         memcpy(dest, source, typeInfo->size);
02357 }
02358 
02359 int CustomData_data_equals(int type, void *data1, void *data2)
02360 {
02361     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(type);
02362 
02363     if (typeInfo->equal)
02364         return typeInfo->equal(data1, data2);
02365     else return !memcmp(data1, data2, typeInfo->size);
02366 }
02367 
02368 void CustomData_data_initminmax(int type, void *min, void *max)
02369 {
02370     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(type);
02371 
02372     if (typeInfo->initminmax)
02373         typeInfo->initminmax(min, max);
02374 }
02375 
02376 
02377 void CustomData_data_dominmax(int type, void *data, void *min, void *max)
02378 {
02379     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(type);
02380 
02381     if (typeInfo->dominmax)
02382         typeInfo->dominmax(data, min, max);
02383 }
02384 
02385 
02386 void CustomData_data_multiply(int type, void *data, float fac)
02387 {
02388     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(type);
02389 
02390     if (typeInfo->multiply)
02391         typeInfo->multiply(data, fac);
02392 }

02394 
02395 void CustomData_data_add(int type, void *data1, void *data2)
02396 {
02397     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(type);
02398 
02399     if (typeInfo->add)
02400         typeInfo->add(data1, data2);
02401 }

02403 void CustomData_bmesh_set(const CustomData *data, void *block, int type, void *source)
02404 {
02405     void *dest = CustomData_bmesh_get(data, block, type);
02406     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(type);
02407 
02408     if (!dest) return;
02409 
02410     if (typeInfo->copy)
02411         typeInfo->copy(source, dest, 1);
02412     else
02413         memcpy(dest, source, typeInfo->size);
02414 }

02417 {

02419     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(type);
02420 
02421     if (!dest) return;
02422 
02423     if (typeInfo->copy)
02424         typeInfo->copy(source, dest, 1);
02425     else
02426         memcpy(dest, source, typeInfo->size);
02427 }

02429 void CustomData_bmesh_set_layer_n(CustomData *data, void *block, int n, void *source)
02430 {
02431     void *dest = CustomData_bmesh_get_layer_n(data, block, n);
02432     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(data->layers[n].type);
02433 
02434     if (!dest) return;
02435

02440 }
02441 
02442 void CustomData_bmesh_interp(CustomData *data, void **src_blocks, float *weights,
02443                           float *sub_weights, int count, void *dest_block)
02444 {
02445     int i, j;
02446     void *source_buf[SOURCE_BUF_SIZE];
02447     void **sources = source_buf;
02448 
02449     /* slow fallback in case we're interpolating a ridiculous number of
02450      * elements
02451      */
02452     if (count > SOURCE_BUF_SIZE)
02453         sources = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*sources) * count,
02454                               "CustomData_interp sources");
02455 
02456     /* interpolates a layer at a time */
02457     for (i = 0; i < data->totlayer; ++i) {
02458         CustomDataLayer *layer = &data->layers[i];
02459         const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
02460         if (typeInfo->interp) {
02461             for (j = 0; j < count; ++j)
02462                 sources[j] = (char *)src_blocks[j] + layer->offset;
02463 
02464             typeInfo->interp(sources, weights, sub_weights, count,
02465                               (char *)dest_block + layer->offset);
02466         }
02467     }
02468 
02469     if (count > SOURCE_BUF_SIZE) MEM_freeN(sources);
02470 }
02471 
02472 void CustomData_bmesh_set_default(CustomData *data, void **block)
02473 {
02474     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
02475     int i;
02476 
02477     if (!*block)
02478         CustomData_bmesh_alloc_block(data, block);
02479 
02480     for (i = 0; i < data->totlayer; ++i) {
02481         int offset = data->layers[i].offset;
02482 
02483         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(data->layers[i].type);
02484 
02485         if (typeInfo->set_default)
02486             typeInfo->set_default((char*)*block + offset, 1);
02487         else memset((char*)*block + offset, 0, typeInfo->size);
02488     }
02489 }
02490 
02491 void CustomData_to_bmesh_block(const CustomData *source, CustomData *dest,
02492                             int src_index, void **dest_block)
02493 {
02494     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
02495     int dest_i, src_i, src_offset;
02496 
02497     if (!*dest_block)
02498         CustomData_bmesh_alloc_block(dest, dest_block);
02499     
02500     /* copies a layer at a time */
02501     dest_i = 0;
02502     for (src_i = 0; src_i < source->totlayer; ++src_i) {
02503 
02504         /* find the first dest layer with type >= the source type
02505          * (this should work because layers are ordered by type)
02506          */
02507         while (dest_i < dest->totlayer && dest->layers[dest_i].type < source->layers[src_i].type) {
02508             ++dest_i;
02509         }
02510 
02511         /* if there are no more dest layers, we're done */
02512         if (dest_i >= dest->totlayer) return;
02513 
02514         /* if we found a matching layer, copy the data */
02515         if (dest->layers[dest_i].type == source->layers[src_i].type) {
02516             int offset = dest->layers[dest_i].offset;
02517             char *src_data = source->layers[src_i].data;
02518             char *dest_data = (char*)*dest_block + offset;
02519 
02520             typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(dest->layers[dest_i].type);
02521             src_offset = src_index * typeInfo->size;
02522 
02523             if (typeInfo->copy)
02524                 typeInfo->copy(src_data + src_offset, dest_data, 1);
02525             else
02526                 memcpy(dest_data, src_data + src_offset, typeInfo->size);
02527 
02528             /* if there are multiple source & dest layers of the same type,
02529              * we don't want to copy all source layers to the same dest, so
02530              * increment dest_i
02531              */
02532             ++dest_i;
02533         }
02534     }
02535 }
02536 
02537 void CustomData_from_bmesh_block(const CustomData *source, CustomData *dest,
02538                               void *src_block, int dest_index)
02539 {
02540     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
02541     int dest_i, src_i, dest_offset;
02542 
02543     /* copies a layer at a time */
02544     dest_i = 0;
02545     for (src_i = 0; src_i < source->totlayer; ++src_i) {
02546 
02547         /* find the first dest layer with type >= the source type
02548          * (this should work because layers are ordered by type)
02549          */
02550         while (dest_i < dest->totlayer && dest->layers[dest_i].type < source->layers[src_i].type) {
02551             ++dest_i;
02552         }
02553 
02554         /* if there are no more dest layers, we're done */
02555         if (dest_i >= dest->totlayer) return;
02556 
02557         /* if we found a matching layer, copy the data */
02558         if (dest->layers[dest_i].type == source->layers[src_i].type) {
02559             int offset = source->layers[src_i].offset;
02560             char *src_data = (char*)src_block + offset;
02561             char *dest_data = dest->layers[dest_i].data;
02562 
02563             typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(dest->layers[dest_i].type);
02564             dest_offset = dest_index * typeInfo->size;
02565 
02566             if (typeInfo->copy)
02567                 typeInfo->copy(src_data, dest_data + dest_offset, 1);
02568             else
02569                 memcpy(dest_data + dest_offset, src_data, typeInfo->size);
02570 
02571             /* if there are multiple source & dest layers of the same type,
02572              * we don't want to copy all source layers to the same dest, so
02573              * increment dest_i
02574              */
02575             ++dest_i;
02576         }
02577     }
02578 
02579 }

02586     *structnum = typeInfo->structnum;
