02600 
02601 static int  CustomData_is_property_layer(int type)
02602 {
02603     if ((type == CD_PROP_FLT) || (type == CD_PROP_INT) || (type == CD_PROP_STR))
02604         return 1;
02605     return 0;
02606 }
02607 
02608 static int cd_layer_find_dupe(CustomData *data, const char *name, int type, int index)
02609 {
02610     int i;
02611     /* see if there is a duplicate */
02612     for (i=0; i<data->totlayer; i++) {
02613         if (i != index) {
02614             CustomDataLayer *layer= &data->layers[i];
02615             
02616             if (CustomData_is_property_layer(type)) {
02617                 if (CustomData_is_property_layer(layer->type) && strcmp(layer->name, name)==0) {
02618                     return 1;
02619                 }
02620             }
02621             else {
02622                 if (i!=index && layer->type==type && strcmp(layer->name, name)==0) {
02623                     return 1;
02624                 }
02625             }
02626         }
02627     }
02628     
02629     return 0;
02630 }
02631 
02632 static int customdata_unique_check(void *arg, const char *name)
02633 {
02634     struct {CustomData *data; int type; int index;} *data_arg= arg;
02635     return cd_layer_find_dupe(data_arg->data, name, data_arg->type, data_arg->index);
02636 }
02637 
02638 void CustomData_set_layer_unique_name(CustomData *data, int index)
02639 {   
02640     CustomDataLayer *nlayer= &data->layers[index];
02641     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo= layerType_getInfo(nlayer->type);
02642 
02643     struct {CustomData *data; int type; int index;} data_arg;
02644     data_arg.data= data;
02645     data_arg.type= nlayer->type;
02646     data_arg.index= index;
02647 
02648     if (!typeInfo->defaultname)
02649         return;
02650     
02651     BLI_uniquename_cb(customdata_unique_check, &data_arg, typeInfo->defaultname, '.', nlayer->name, sizeof(nlayer->name));
02652 }
02653 
02654 void CustomData_validate_layer_name(const CustomData *data, int type, char *name, char *outname)
02655 {
02656     int index = -1;
02657 
02658     /* if a layer name was given, try to find that layer */
02659     if (name[0])
02660         index = CustomData_get_named_layer_index(data, type, name);
02661 
02662     if (index < 0) {
02663         /* either no layer was specified, or the layer we want has been
02664          * deleted, so assign the active layer to name
02665          */
02666         index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type);
02667         strcpy(outname, data->layers[index].name);
02668     }
02669     else
02670         strcpy(outname, name);
02671 }
02672 
02673 int CustomData_verify_versions(struct CustomData *data, int index)
02674 {
02675     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
02676     CustomDataLayer *layer = &data->layers[index];
02677     int i, keeplayer = 1;
02678 
02679     if (layer->type >= CD_NUMTYPES) {
02680         keeplayer = 0; /* unknown layer type from future version */
02681     }
02682     else {
02683         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
02684 
02685         if (!typeInfo->defaultname && (index > 0) &&
02686             data->layers[index-1].type == layer->type)
02687             keeplayer = 0; /* multiple layers of which we only support one */
02688     }
02689 
02690     if (!keeplayer) {
02691         for (i=index+1; i < data->totlayer; ++i)
02692             data->layers[i-1] = data->layers[i];
02693         data->totlayer--;
02694     }
02695 
02696     return keeplayer;
02697 }

02699 /****************************** External Files *******************************/
02700 
02701 static void customdata_external_filename(char filename[FILE_MAX], ID *id, CustomDataExternal *external)
02702 {
02703     BLI_strncpy(filename, external->filename, FILE_MAX);
02704     BLI_path_abs(filename, ID_BLEND_PATH(G.main, id));
02705 }
02706 
02707 void CustomData_external_reload(CustomData *data, ID *UNUSED(id), CustomDataMask mask, int totelem)
02708 {
02709     CustomDataLayer *layer;
02710     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
02711     int i;
02712 
02713     for (i=0; i<data->totlayer; i++) {
02714         layer = &data->layers[i];
02715         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
02716 
02717         if (!(mask & CD_TYPE_AS_MASK(layer->type)));
02718         else if ((layer->flag & CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL) && (layer->flag & CD_FLAG_IN_MEMORY)) {
02719             if (typeInfo->free)
02720                 typeInfo->free(layer->data, totelem, typeInfo->size);
02721             layer->flag &= ~CD_FLAG_IN_MEMORY;
02722         }
02723     }
02724 }
02725 
02726 void CustomData_external_read(CustomData *data, ID *id, CustomDataMask mask, int totelem)
02727 {
02728     CustomDataExternal *external= data->external;
02729     CustomDataLayer *layer;
02730     CDataFile *cdf;
02731     CDataFileLayer *blay;
02732     char filename[FILE_MAX];
02733     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
02734     int i, update = 0;
02735 
02736     if (!external)
02737         return;
02738     
02739     for (i=0; i<data->totlayer; i++) {
02740         layer = &data->layers[i];
02741         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
02742 
02743         if (!(mask & CD_TYPE_AS_MASK(layer->type)));
02744         else if (layer->flag & CD_FLAG_IN_MEMORY);
02745         else if ((layer->flag & CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL) && typeInfo->read)
02746             update= 1;
02747     }
02748 
02749     if (!update)
02750         return;
02751 
02752     customdata_external_filename(filename, id, external);
02753 
02754     cdf= cdf_create(CDF_TYPE_MESH);
02755     if (!cdf_read_open(cdf, filename)) {
02756         fprintf(stderr, "Failed to read %s layer from %s.\n", layerType_getName(layer->type), filename);
02757         return;
02758     }
02759 
02760     for (i=0; i<data->totlayer; i++) {
02761         layer = &data->layers[i];
02762         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
02763 
02764         if (!(mask & CD_TYPE_AS_MASK(layer->type)));
02765         else if (layer->flag & CD_FLAG_IN_MEMORY);
02766         else if ((layer->flag & CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL) && typeInfo->read) {
02767             blay= cdf_layer_find(cdf, layer->type, layer->name);
02768 
02769             if (blay) {
02770                 if (cdf_read_layer(cdf, blay)) {
02771                     if (typeInfo->read(cdf, layer->data, totelem));
02772                     else break;
02773                     layer->flag |= CD_FLAG_IN_MEMORY;
02774                 }
02775                 else
02776                     break;
02777             }
02778         }
02779     }
02780 
02781     cdf_read_close(cdf);
02782     cdf_free(cdf);
02783 }
02784 
02785 void CustomData_external_write(CustomData *data, ID *id, CustomDataMask mask, int totelem, int free)
02786 {
02787     CustomDataExternal *external= data->external;
02788     CustomDataLayer *layer;
02789     CDataFile *cdf;
02790     CDataFileLayer *blay;
02791     const LayerTypeInfo *typeInfo;
02792     int i, update = 0;
02793     char filename[FILE_MAX];
02794 
02795     if (!external)
02796         return;
02797 
02798     /* test if there is anything to write */
02799     for (i=0; i<data->totlayer; i++) {
02800         layer = &data->layers[i];
02801         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
02802 
02803         if (!(mask & CD_TYPE_AS_MASK(layer->type)));
02804         else if ((layer->flag & CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL) && typeInfo->write)
02805             update= 1;
02806     }
02807 
02808     if (!update)
02809         return;
02810 
02811     /* make sure data is read before we try to write */
02812     CustomData_external_read(data, id, mask, totelem);
02813     customdata_external_filename(filename, id, external);
02814 
02815     cdf= cdf_create(CDF_TYPE_MESH);
02816 
02817     for (i=0; i<data->totlayer; i++) {
02818         layer = &data->layers[i];
02819         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
02820 
02821         if ((layer->flag & CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL) && typeInfo->filesize) {
02822             if (layer->flag & CD_FLAG_IN_MEMORY) {
02823                 cdf_layer_add(cdf, layer->type, layer->name,
02824                     typeInfo->filesize(cdf, layer->data, totelem));
02825             }
02826             else {
02827                 cdf_free(cdf);
02828                 return; /* read failed for a layer! */
02829             }
02830         }
02831     }
02832 
02833     if (!cdf_write_open(cdf, filename)) {
02834         fprintf(stderr, "Failed to open %s for writing.\n", filename);
02835         return;
02836     }
02837 
02838     for (i=0; i<data->totlayer; i++) {
02839         layer = &data->layers[i];
02840         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
02841 
02842         if ((layer->flag & CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL) && typeInfo->write) {
02843             blay= cdf_layer_find(cdf, layer->type, layer->name);
02844 
02845             if (cdf_write_layer(cdf, blay)) {
02846                 if (typeInfo->write(cdf, layer->data, totelem));
02847                 else break;
02848             }
02849             else
02850                 break;
02851         }
02852     }
02853 
02854     if (i != data->totlayer) {
02855         fprintf(stderr, "Failed to write data to %s.\n", filename);
02856         cdf_free(cdf);
02857         return;
02858     }
02859 
02860     for (i=0; i<data->totlayer; i++) {
02861         layer = &data->layers[i];
02862         typeInfo = layerType_getInfo(layer->type);
02863 
02864         if ((layer->flag & CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL) && typeInfo->write) {
02865             if (free) {
02866                 if (typeInfo->free)
02867                     typeInfo->free(layer->data, totelem, typeInfo->size);
02868                 layer->flag &= ~CD_FLAG_IN_MEMORY;
02869             }
02870         }
02871     }
02872 
02873     cdf_write_close(cdf);
02874     cdf_free(cdf);
02875 }
02876 
02877 void CustomData_external_add(CustomData *data, ID *UNUSED(id), int type, int UNUSED(totelem), const char *filename)
02878 {
02879     CustomDataExternal *external= data->external;
02880     CustomDataLayer *layer;
02881     int layer_index;
02882 
02883     layer_index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type);
02884     if (layer_index < 0) return;
02885 
02886     layer = &data->layers[layer_index];
02887 
02888     if (layer->flag & CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL)
02889         return;
02890 
02891     if (!external) {
02892         external= MEM_callocN(sizeof(CustomDataExternal), "CustomDataExternal");
02893         data->external= external;
02894     }
02895     BLI_strncpy(external->filename, filename, sizeof(external->filename));
02896 
02897     layer->flag |= CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL|CD_FLAG_IN_MEMORY;
02898 }
02899 
02900 void CustomData_external_remove(CustomData *data, ID *id, int type, int totelem)
02901 {
02902     CustomDataExternal *external= data->external;
02903     CustomDataLayer *layer;
02904     //char filename[FILE_MAX];
02905     int layer_index; // i, remove_file;
02906 
02907     layer_index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type);
02908     if (layer_index < 0) return;
02909 
02910     layer = &data->layers[layer_index];
02911 
02912     if (!external)
02913         return;
02914 
02915     if (layer->flag & CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL) {
02916         if (!(layer->flag & CD_FLAG_IN_MEMORY))
02917             CustomData_external_read(data, id, CD_TYPE_AS_MASK(layer->type), totelem);
02918 
02919         layer->flag &= ~CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL;
02920 
02921 #if 0
02922         remove_file= 1;
02923         for (i=0; i<data->totlayer; i++)
02924             if (data->layers[i].flag & CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL)
02925                 remove_file= 0;
02926 
02927         if (remove_file) {
02928             customdata_external_filename(filename, id, external);
02929             cdf_remove(filename);
02930             CustomData_external_free(data);
02931         }
02932 #endif
02933     }
02934 }

02936 int CustomData_external_test(CustomData *data, int type)
02937 {
02938     CustomDataLayer *layer;
02939     int layer_index;
02940 
02941     layer_index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type);
02942     if (layer_index < 0) return 0;
02943 
02944     layer = &data->layers[layer_index];
02945     return (layer->flag & CD_FLAG_EXTERNAL);
02946 }
